bibl.title: The Two Faces of Codex 33 in Acts.
bibl.note: Codex 33 is basically a witness for the Majority text tradition in Acts 1:1-11:25, and an excellent witness for the Egyptian textual tradition (P74 01 A B C and 81) in Acts 11:26-28:31.
bibl.seg: Geer Thomas C., Jr., The Two Faces of Codex 33 in Acts.
Codex 33 is basically a witness for the Majority text tradition in Acts 1:1-11:25, and an excellent witness for the Egyptian textual tradition (P74 01 A B C and 81) in Acts 11:26-28:31.
